reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Me and my wife were there on the 27 & 28 of Oct-11, Very nice place, very good breakfast. Room nice & clean (good service).
reviews.title: Two days in Venice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have just returned from four days in Venice. Le Isole is a small hotel in an excellent location - prebook the waterbus from the airport (it's cheaper) and get off at S Zaccaria. It's then a walk across the waterfront to a small alleyway Calle del Vin next to the bridge on the left, up the alley, go left then right and the hotel is alongside the canal near to the bridge. So easy and very quick. It's also very close to the main sites, eg, a short walk back to the waterfront then right for St Mark's Square.
reviews.title: Great hotel in excellent location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Checking in was quick and efficient (friendly staff) and we were given access information for the free WiFi.
reviews.title: Can't wait to stay there again!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: It's a small hotel. We got a standard room which looked out on a narrow courtyard area. Not exciting as views in Venice go, but it didn't matter as we weren't there to look out the window! The room was small but very well furnished and clean. The bed is king size, there are two narrow wardrobes, a safe, mini bar, TV with European Sky, two chairs and a table. The bathroom is also small but the shower (no bath) is excellent: hot water, good water pressure, two shower heads (detachable wand on the wall plus a rainfall shower head above).
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast is the usual selection of juice, fresh pastries, fruit (tinned but still nice), cold meats, yoghurt, cereal. You can have bacon and scrambled egg cooked if you want. A decent selection of teas and the usual variations for coffee.
reviews.title: Awesome Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I chose this hotel based on the reviews that others had left (and the fact that there were no negative reivews). I booked a weekend away for my husband's birthday and this hotel was perfect. It is located near to San Marco so you get all the hustle and bustle if you like or you turn in a different direction and go into quieter streets. Our room was lovely and quiet and the breakfast was excellent. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone, it was great. My only quibble were that the pilows were really hard but I asked for a softer one and it arrived soon after!
reviews.title: Fantastic

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel met all our expectations: warm, cosy and well-equipped hotel in the very center of Venice, only 5 min walking from San Marco and San Zaccaria vaporetto stop, you can see gongolas from you window from one side and have a shopping area with restaurants from the other. And it's easy to find, because finding the way to your hotel is kind of tricky in Venice, especially at night.
reviews.title: Charming experience in Venice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was spacious with comfortable bed, warm bathroom (it's very important because you feel shivery all the time in Venice in winter) with a real bath, not just shower.
reviews.title: Hotel Le Islole

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012
reviews.text: Breakfast was normal, they have a small patio and you can eat outside in summer.
reviews.title: The perfect hotel for our trip to Venice in Jan 2012

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Staff was extremely nice and hepful we got a lot of smiles from them, if you travelled in Italy before you know what I'm talking about=)
reviews.title: very good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here in early March to celebrate my 50th birthday. The hotel staff was incredible, starting with our early morning arrival from NY to a wonderful breakfast with bellinis and flowers in our room. The location was wonderful, and the deluxe room was beautiful. The only disappointment was the noise in the room. For such a lovely hotel we were surprised by this. (We usually stay at the Ritz Carlton hotel group so we are used to silent rooms.) it was magical. Just wish it was a bit warmer to sit outside on the beautiful patio. They should get Warner's outside! Overall excellent!
reviews.title: Amazing 50th birthday at Le Isole!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I chose the hotel based on the reviews here and I was very glad I did! Finding the hotel is very easy from San Zecceria ferry stop. Located right on the canal, there are little bridges and gondolas all around the hotel. Only 5 minute walk to San Marco Square and lots of cafe's and shops right outside the hotel. We booked a standard double room and it was perfect. The size wasn't huge, however it wasn't small either. We had a window opening to the canal and a little bridge below which was romantic. Service was great.
reviews.title: Little Gem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked this hotel based on the excellent reviews and we can honestly say it turned out to be every bit as good, if not better than we imagined. My first contact with the hotel was when I emailed them a week before our trip. As I was planning on proposing to my now fiancée whilst we were in Venice I wanted it to be a very special occasion so asked the hotel if there was anything they could do to make our stay special. They replied very promptly and said they would put some flowers and a bottle of Prosecco in our room asking when I would Like this to be done, to which I replied it would be great if they could have everything in place when we returned from our meal on the first night. They lived up to their word and without any reminder from me, we returned from our first meal in Venice and a successful proposal to find a lovely bunch of flowers and Prosecco in an ice bucket.
reviews.title: Fantastic hotel, perfect for our engagement

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Throughout our stay the staff were brilliant, very friendly, polite and informative. Nothing was too much trouble for them. They really did make our stay brilliant. The hotel itself was very nice with the rooms recently refurbished and absolutely spotless, as was the whole hotel. The room was spacious and modern with everything you could need. The breakfast was good, with a nice range of choices and I would recommend eating in the courtyard which is a lovely place to sit of a morning or evening.
reviews.title: Venice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location of the hotel was also great with a two minute walk to the beautiful Piazza San Marco and only about a 10 minute walk to the Rialto, if you don't get lost down the many canal streets but that is half the fun. I can't say enough about how good the hotel is and in particular the staff. I would recommend anyone travelling to Venice to stay at Hotel Le Isole, you won't be disappointed.
reviews.title: Excellent representation of Venice!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Super clean and very close to San Marco and and airport boat station.
reviews.title: Clean, friendly, good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Staff very friendly and 24/7 hot coffee & tea & biscuits & fruits at the breakfast area.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011
reviews.text: Free wifi with good signal in the room and public area.
reviews.title: Cozy and charming ambience!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Can't ask for more! I've been travelling a lot recently and this is one of the best.
reviews.title: Lovely modern boutique hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: Stayed here for 3 nights in June 2011 and had a ball. The Hotel is beautifull right in the heart of Venice everything is right beside you. The staff were more than helpful and the Hotel itself was spotless. Venice is the most beautifuland magical place in the world.
reviews.title: nice rooms
